turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a tall latte, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, I'm your barista Dan at your favorite Starbucks. What can I get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like a tall latte and a tall caffe vanilla frappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that for here or to go?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: to go please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That'll be $6.90

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much is the blueberry scone?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The blueberry scone is $2.25

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have a blueberry scone as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly, that would make your total, $ 9.15

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect! Can you please add extra steamed milk in the latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Most certainly! Is there anything else that I can get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think that'll be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me get you your change from a $20

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like a tray for the coffee to go?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that would be wonderful.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! Your coffee will be coming right up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You have a wonderful day!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Where do I wait?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just step to the side and I will call you when it is ready.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I have your name please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, its Maria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great Maria, it will be coming right up!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long of a wait will it be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just a few minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you!
